mapper.update: update news set news_title = #{newsTitle},news_sum = #{newsSum},news_source = #{newsSource},news_content = #{newsContent} where news_title = #{newsTitle}
mapper.insert: insert into news (news_title, news_sum, news_source, news_public_time, news_content, news_column, news_creator, news_public_state) values (#{newsTitle},#{newsSum},#{newsSource},#{newsPublicTime},#{newsContent}, #{newsColumn},#{newsCreator},#{newsPublicState})
update news set news_public_state = "通过" where news_id = #{newsId}
update news set news_public_state = "未通过" where news_id = #{newsId}
